intro.title: Planetary Health Governance Framework
intro.paragraph1: The Planetary Health Governance Framework emerges as a revolutionary blueprint for transforming governance from systems that generate health crises into systems that generate planetary healing.
intro.paragraph2: This framework serves as the ethical compass and scientific foundation for all governance systems, ensuring that every human activity contributes to the flourishing of the entire web of life.

buttons.startWithGuides: Start with our comprehensive framework that explains how to coordinate governance for the health of all life on Earth.
